labels.label:
Choose input hdfs folder: - hdfs://hadoop-namenode:9014/input
Choose input file pattern: - input.json - Figure_0.png
Run this flow to process ingested data on Spark
Run this flow to ingest data in platform
Run this flow to ingest algorithms in the platform

Take files from a specified folder from draco container file system
eg. /opt/nifi/nifi-current/input
put file into specific folder of HDFS

Expose POST endpoint for ingestion (eg. :8086/ingest-data) accept 1 file
curl example: curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:8086/ingest-data' \ --header 'Content-Type: image/png' \ --data-binary 'path/to/file.png'
put file into specific folder of HDFS

labels.label:
Set Remote Url with Livy URI
Example: http://livy:8998/batches

Set Directory with the HDFS path you want to pick up input files. Examples: hdfs://hadoop-namenode:9014/input
Set File Filter with a regex to define which file to pick up. Examples: [^\.].* -> all files in the directory

labels.label: filter to return only one time the http response

Expose POST endpoint for ingestion (eg. :8085/ingest-algorithm) accept .zip files
curl example: curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:8085/ingest-algorithm' \ --header 'Content-Type: application/zip' \ --data-binary 'path/to/file.zip'
put extracted files into draco file system (shared with livy and spark also)
set to empty the response body
